class.description: StubNavToNode: Stub simplier version of NavToNode handler.
StubStateHandlerPub: Stub simplier version of StateHandler handler that creates ROS2 publisher.
StubStateHandlerData: Stub simplier version of StateHandler handler that modifies global current state.
StubVDAActionSub: Stub simplier version of VDAAction handler that creates ROS2 subscription.
StubVDAActionData: Stub simplier version of VDAAction handler that modifies global current state.
